title: New: Fthrsn – saria's swag
body:
It’s been a few months since we’ve heard from CitR fave **Fthrsn**.

After a semi painful wait, he’s back with this cute as fuck appropriation of the theme-tune to the Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. It also happens to serve as the announcement of his next EP, Middle School Swag. Great title, great album art – hopefully a great EP. More when we hear it.

After a semi painful wait, he’s back with this cute as fuck appropriation of the theme-tune to the Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. It also happens to serve as the announcement of his next EP, Middle School Swag. Great title, great album \[…\]
